page.title: 17Community Project & Fun Run
page.content: The Lanchester and Burnhope Community Project,set up in 1983,is sponsored by the Manpower Services Commission and is a resource centre for the unemployed.It is in a renovated County Council depot in Kitswell Road.Facilities include car mechanics, woodwork,toy making,arts and crafts and silk screening.Everyone is welcome. {Special Events {Lanchester Fun Run On the 23rd of May 1985 Lanchester Fun Run was on.We started at quarter to seven.First we went to get changed and get our numbers and then we went to the start.When we started to run it was raining but when we got going it was alright.There was about 1,000 people running.It was very hard especially when we came to the hills. I was very tired when I got half way
